title: Textile Museum of Canada
summary: Redesign focused on navigation and engagement for younger audiences via a modern virtual experience.
problem: How might we redesign the website for easy navigation and attract younger, diverse audiences?
goal: Renovate IA and navigation with emphasis on engagement and interaction.

title: Citizen Service Portal Redesign
summary: Redesigning the OPS citizen service portal to streamline access and improve accessibility.
problem: Citizens faced fragmented entry points and inconsistent service patterns across touchpoints.
goal: Unify navigation, create a task-first IA, and improve WCAG accessibility.

title: GasRoute: A Mobile Application for Locating Nearby Gas Stations
summary: A location-aware app to quickly find nearby gas stations with pricing and route ETA.
problem: Drivers waste time comparing stations and detours without clear price and distance context.
goal: Surface closest good-value stations and provide one-tap routing.

title: UofT Library Indoor Navigation
summary: Indoor wayfinding to locate books, rooms, and services across multi-floor libraries.
problem: Users struggle to translate call numbers into locations, especially across floors.
goal: Provide step-by-step indoor routes and shelf-level guidance.

title: ExplrEcho: A Localized Travel Diary and Recommendation Platform
summary: Personalized travel logs that power local recommendations for similar explorers.
problem: Generic reviews miss personal context; travelers want relevant tips from similar profiles.
goal: Turn rich trip diaries into actionable, local recommendations.
